Row.Text: Welcome to Finland, great leader. I am Urho Kekkonen, its president. Come and sit down, let us discuss the diplomatic relations of our two great nations. Oh, if you want to take a sauna, just tell me. I'll heat it up in no time.

I bid you welcome to Finland. I am president Urho Kaleva Kekkonen. Come, tell me about the state of your nation in these challenging times. Oh - it's freezing outside - shall I heat up the sauna, friend?
Enjoy your victory now. Soon you will be punished for your evil deeds.
Stop wasting my time.
Accepting such a deal would be treason.
I'm starting to get really fed up with seeing your face here. I suggest you to leave.
Ah - you finally arrived - the sauna has already been heated up for you.
I have no desire to aid you with your petty struggle, if that's what you came for.
All the best for your nation in its continuing struggle.
For your information, the continuing mobilisation of your army near our borders will cause serious consequences.
Your continuing expansion is severely upsetting. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
It has come to my attention that you have purchased land near our borders. Should it be continued, I'm afraid it could severely hurt our relations.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
We were just discussing about your continuing expansion. You should take that as a warning.
We are proud to have an ally with such a powerful military as yours.
You're empire is famous for its strong economy. I hope it goes for the good of your people.
Is it my favourite city-state there?
Your army is so pathetic I hope someone will put it down from its misery soon.
Your warmongering is severely concerning my people. Surely there are better ways of solving problems than your petty wars.
Sorry. As we met so little time ago, I would prefer a more neutral approach to our diplomacy.
I want you to know that not Finland, nor the world will tolerate your actions. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Sorry. Enough is enough. I cannot pursue a peaceful relationship with your nation anymore.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Finland has done you no wrong, and deserves nothing of this sort.
I am pleased to hear of your friendship with {1_CivName}, as they are great friends of mine.
Getting too close to {1_CivName} will severely damage our diplomatic relations, for you to know.
I strongly urge you to reconsider your position with {1_CivName}. They have been nothing but good friends to me.
Finland agrees with you that {1_CivName} is not to be trusted.
We noticed your alliance with {1_CivName}, and Finland is not afraid to follow you to this alliance.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}?
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for our cause. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will have them rethink their actions.
A declaration of friendship would benefit us both. Surely you agree?
Great leader, would you like to make a declaration of friendship with Finland?
The movement of your troops near our borders seems quite alarming. Just passing through, I hope?
I am concerned about your growing expansion, and must warn you against it.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
I am concerned about your growing expansion, and must warn you against it.
I will never forget your merciful actions towards our civilians.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Sorry, I cannot accept. The neutral territory belongs to anyone who settles it first.
I understand your concerns. I will see to it that this case will be settled peacefully.
You have some very alluring luxury resources. Finland hopes to have a share.
Finland would be willing to open her borders if you are willing to do the same.
Would you be willing to assist a friend?
Prepare to die.
Very well. A maelstrom of death shall envelope us both.
Finland shall never surrender.
The world will never forgive your foolish actions of betrayal. This will eventually lead to your downfall.
There will be no peace.
This is quite disappointing to hear.
You have our thanks.
